faqs.admission process: You can apply online via the Admissions page or contact the admin for guidance.
faqs.contact: You can reach us at info@moha.gov.lk or call +94 112 785 141.
faqs.payment methods: We accept online payment, bank transfer, and cash payments at the institute.
faqs.certificate: Upon completion, students will receive an official government-recognized certificate.
faqs.timings: Courses are held on weekdays from 6 PM to 9 PM and weekends from 9 AM to 4 PM.
faqs.scholarships: Merit-based and need-based scholarships are available for eligible students.
faqs.support: Students can contact our support team via email or call for assistance.

notes: All courses follow government-approved curriculum and are recognized nationally. Online classes include live sessions and recorded lectures.
